home.title: Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
home.description: Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang provides comprehensive dental services, including dental implants, orthodontics, cosmetic crowns, and general dentistry.

about.title: About Passion Dental – Professional Dental Team in Da Nang
about.description: Passion Dental is led by Specialist Level I Dr. Dang Hoang Thanh Tung – Implant expert, and Dr. Nguyen Bao Yen – Orthodontic specialist. Guided by the treatment philosophy of Right – Adequate – Aesthetic, delivering long-lasting and sustainable results.

services.title: Dental Services – Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
services.description: Comprehensive dental services at Passion Dental: orthodontics (braces), dental implants, cosmetic crowns, and general treatment. FDA/CE-certified materials and Ministry of Health–standard sterilization protocols.

general.title: General Dentistry – Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
general.description: General dental treatments at Passion Dental: scaling, cosmetic fillings, root canal therapy, wisdom tooth extraction, periodontal treatment, teeth whitening, and gummy smile correction. Comprehensive diagnostics with absolute safety.

orthodontic.title: Orthodontics (Braces) – Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
orthodontic.description: Professional orthodontic treatment at Passion Dental: metal/ceramic braces, Invisalign/ClearCorrect aligners. Led by Dr. Nguyen Bao Yen – orthodontic expert trained in Sato philosophy and MEAW technique. Lifetime support after treatment.

implant.title: Dental Implants – Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
implant.description: Professional implant dentistry at Passion Dental: Specialist Level I Dr. Dang Hoang Thanh Tung – implant expert certified in Zygomatic Implant techniques. Premium implant systems: Nobel, Straumann, Osstem. 3D CT Cone Beam imaging with lifetime warranty.

porcelain.title: Cosmetic Porcelain Crowns – Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
porcelain.description: Cosmetic porcelain services at Passion Dental: Veneers, Zirconia/Emax/Lava crowns. Digital Smile Design (DSD), minimal-prep techniques, and genuine materials with warranty. Dr. Nguyen Bao Yen directly examines and designs each case.

booking.title: Book an Appointment – Contact Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang
booking.description: Book a free consultation at Passion Dental Clinic Da Nang. Meet our specialists for personalized treatment planning. All information is kept strictly confidential.

diary.title: Smile Diary – Patient Photos & Reviews – Passion Dental
diary.description: Browse real before-and-after cases at Passion Dental: implants, orthodontics, cosmetic crowns, and general treatment. Authentic patient reviews and video testimonials.

blog.title: Blog & Dental Knowledge – Passion Dental
blog.description: Dental tips, oral care guidance, and treatment insights from Passion Dental. Regular updates on oral health.

knowledge.title: Dental Knowledge – Passion Dental
knowledge.description: Dental knowledge from Passion Dental with frequent updates on oral health.
